==========================
Website Sale Stock Control
==========================

This module extends standard e-commerce allowing block sale products and
their variants without stock.

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

#. Go to products and create one of type "Stockable".
#. Select an option in stock control field.
#. Go to the shop and if the product doesn't have stock, you will see an icon
   indicating that.
#. The available stock is checked in checkout step too.


.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/113/9.0

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/e-commerce/issues>`_. In case of trouble, please
check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.

info.summary: Do not show products without stock in shop on line
info.html_description:
Website Sale Stock Control

This module extends standard e-commerce allowing block sale products and their variants without stock.

Usage

To use this module, you need to:

  1. Go to products and create one of type “Stockable”.
  2. Select an option in stock control field.
  3. Go to the shop and if the product doesn’t have stock, you will see an icon indicating that.
  4. The available stock is checked in checkout step too.

Bug Tracker

Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
